content:
Would like to get some examples of the "potential / avoided" adverse events mentioned in the FHIR resource definition. Does anyone have examples of this? The only one that came to mind was an unintentional dosage mistake (e.g., took 2 pills that day rather than 1) where no effects were seen.

@Hugh Glover
A surgeon was about to perform a carpal tunnel release, but noted that the wrong limb had been prepped for surgery in the theatre...
@David Hay it sounds like there are cases in clinical care. wondering if there are clinical research cases. thoughts?
not so familiar with clinical research, sorry...
